definition: short, simple literary or artistic creation/essay/skit
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: The Five Humoresques reveal Reger in lighter mode.
sentences.chinese: 五首幽默小品則顯示出其輕快的一面。

sentences.english: It is some essays yes and all.
Serve jello as cold dishes or ordinary appetizers would fit perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 無論是夏日消暑小品或平日的開胃小點均適宜。

sentences.english: The crosstalk (comic dialogue) is the main form of public entertainment in China.
sentences.chinese: 相聲小品是我國大衆娛樂的主要形式。

sentences.english: Scherzo, Four Pieces for piano No. 4
sentences.chinese: 諧謔曲，爲鋼琴而作的小品4首。

sentences.chinese: 海清和黃海波會給我們帶來一個小品。

sentences.chinese: 第一部分，格里格鋼琴抒情小品的創作背景。

sentences.english: This painting is a curiosa of small pictures in Song Dynasty, which is collected by the Palace Museum.
sentences.chinese: 《荔枝圖》系故宮博物院珍藏的宋代小品畫之精品。

sentences.english: The article primarily introduces the way of organizing landscape plants and mini-buildings.
sentences.chinese: 着重介紹了園林植物與建築小品的配置的方法。

sentences.english: Bamboo building and furniture in garden are favorable to recover the poetic imagery of farm garden.
sentences.chinese: 園林竹建築及小品有利於營造城市園林的山林野。

sentences.english: He is a champion at writing familiar essays.
Most of Bacons essays are concise.
sentences.chinese: 培根的多數小品文都很簡潔。

sentences.english: Students were instructed to submit their essays before the end of the term.
sentences.chinese: 在這學期結束前，學生被命令提交他們的小品文。

sentences.english: Skit and sitcom actor Zhao Benshan is in the sixth place.

sentences.english: Among the existing works are his modern paintings and his Qirutihua Xiaopin, theory of modern painting.
sentences.chinese: 有今畫和今畫論《七如題畫小品》行世。

definition: abbr. for 春節聯歡晚會|春节联欢晚会[Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4]
Zhao Benshan (1958-), universally known PRC TV comedian
comic crosstalk/formalized comic dialogue between two stand-up comics: funny man 逗哏[dou4 gen2] and straight man 捧哏[peng3 gen2]
CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special/abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]
pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4

definition: straight man (supporting role in comic dialogue 對口相聲|对口相声[dui4 kou3 xiang4 sheng1])/to react with exasperation to the silliness of the funny man 逗哏[dou4 gen2]
funny man (lead role in comic dialogue 對口相聲|对口相声[dui4 kou3 xiang4 sheng1])/to joke/to play the fool/to provoke laughter
genre of song-and-dance duet popular in northeast China
